title: Navigation Bar Dropdown Functionality on Desktop
description: Verify that the global navigation bar displays dropdown menus correctly on desktop devices and all links are functional.

steps.description: Open the FarmSense homepage on a desktop browser.
Hover over each navigation menu item that has a dropdown.
Confirm that the dropdown menu appears for each hovered menu item.
Click each link in the dropdown menus.
Verify that clicking each dropdown link navigates to the correct page as expected.

title: Navigation Bar Responsiveness on Mobile
description: Ensure the navigation bar is fully responsive and operable on mobile devices with touch interactions.

steps.description: Open the FarmSense homepage on a mobile device or mobile emulator.
Tap on the navigation bar menu icon to expand the menu.
Verify that the navigation menu expands and displays all items correctly.
Tap on dropdown menu items to expand nested links.
Confirm dropdowns open properly on tap without UI breakage.
Tap links in the expanded menu.
Ensure the app navigates to the correct pages on mobile.

title: Root Layout Global Styles Application
description: Validate that the root layout applies global styles and providers consistently across all pages of the application.

steps.description: Navigate to various pages including homepage, technology blog, and education guides.
Check that global styles such as typography, colors, and spacing are consistent across all pages.
Verify that UI components provided by global providers render and behave consistently.

title: Water Logic Page Content and Layout Verification
description: Ensure the Water Logic technical blog page renders with correct detailed content and consistent layout.

steps.description: Navigate to the Water Logic blog page.
Confirm the page displays the soil water potential and irrigation logic content accurately.
Verify images and code examples load correctly and align properly within the page layout.
Check for the presence of global styles and consistent footer.

title: Yield Prediction Page Content and Layout Verification
description: Verify the Yield Prediction technical blog page displays content about GDD and AI vision yield prediction accurately with correct layout.

steps.description: Navigate to the Yield Prediction blog page.
Validate the presence and accuracy of content related to Growing Degree Days (GDD) and AI-based yield prediction.
Ensure all images and diagrams render correctly without distortion.
Check layout consistency with technology blog footer and global styles.

title: Sensor Education Beginner Guide Content Validation
description: Confirm the Beginner sensor guide page for building ESP32 sensors is complete, accurate, and properly formatted.

steps.description: Access the Sensor Education Beginner guide page.
Verify all steps for ESP32 sensor building are present and detailed.
Check for correct rendering of code snippets, images, and explanatory text.
Confirm consistency with global styles and navigational elements.

title: Sensor Education Advanced Guide Content Validation
description: Validate the Advanced sensor guide page for integrating LoRa and RS-485 sensors is accurate, well structured and content complete.

steps.description: Navigate to the Sensor Education Advanced guide page.
Confirm detailed instructions on LoRa and RS-485 sensor integration are present.
Ensure code examples and images are loading and formatted correctly.
Check the layout consistency and presence of navigation and footer elements.

title: Technology Blog Footer Links and Layout
description: Verify that the technology blog footer is displayed on relevant pages and contains functional links to support and additional info.

steps.description: Open multiple technology blog pages such as Water Logic and Yield Prediction.
Confirm the footer is visible and styled consistently.
Click footer links and verify they navigate to the correct support and info pages.

title: Contact Modal Open, Input, and Close Behavior
description: Test that the global contact modal opens on user action, accepts inputs correctly, and closes as expected.

steps.description: Click on the UI element that triggers the contact modal.
Verify the modal appears on screen.
Enter valid inquiry details into the contact form fields.
Confirm input accepts user data correctly.
Submit the contact form.
Ensure form submission success response or message is displayed.
Close the modal using the close button and by clicking outside the modal.
Verify modal closes correctly in all cases.

title: Global Modal Management - Multiple Modal Handling
description: Assess the global modal provider's ability to handle multiple modal interactions without UI conflicts.

steps.description: Trigger the contact modal.
Verify contact modal is visible.
Attempt to open a second modal if implemented (e.g., accessibility modal).
Confirm multiple modals either stack properly or that only one modal can be open at a time as per design.
Close all open modals.
Ensure no modal overlays remain and focus is correctly restored.

title: Page Navigation Using Global Navigation Bar
description: Validate user can navigate to homepage, technology blog sections, and education guides using the global navigation bar without errors.

steps.description: From homepage, click navigation bar link to Technology Blog section.
Verify the Technology Blog page loads correctly.
Use navigation bar to access Sensor Education Beginner guide.
Confirm page loads with correct content.
Navigate back to homepage via navigation bar.
Verify successful navigation with no errors.

title: Deployment Verification on Vercel
description: Check that deployment to Vercel completes successfully with proper domain configuration and environment variables.

steps.description: Push code changes to GitHub repository triggering deployment.
Monitor Vercel deployment logs for errors.
Confirm deployment completes successfully.
Access deployed site using domain name.
Verify the site loads properly and environment variables are applied.

title: GitHub Repository Sync with Deployment Pipeline
description: Ensure that commits pushed to the GitHub repository trigger the deployment pipeline without sync issues.

steps.description: Make a commit and push it to the GitHub main branch.
Verify that Vercel detects the push and starts deployment process automatically.
Confirm no sync or webhook failures occur.

title: Image and Asset Load Performance and Size Compliance
description: Validate all images and assets load efficiently within size restrictions and do not degrade performance across devices.

steps.description: Load multiple pages containing images and assets on desktop and mobile devices.
Confirm images load without errors or broken links.
Check page load time for performance impact due to images.
Verify that all assets conform to predefined size restrictions using developer tools.

title: Error Handling for Broken Navigation Links
description: Test that the application handles navigation to non-existent or invalid URLs gracefully with proper error or 404 pages.

steps.description: Manually enter invalid URLs in the browser within the app domain.
Verify the application displays a user-friendly 404 or error page.
Navigate using navigation bar to a temporarily removed or broken link if available.
Confirm appropriate error handling and feedback is provided to the user.
